original: Little is known of this curious plant.

original: This story is absurd.

original: Get up early tomorrow morning!

original: I'll take the cheapest one.

original: That's them.

original: I don't speak your language.

original: Sing with me.

original: I wonder if she likes me.

original: This sounds like a trap.

translated: Ne mangez pas gras, pas salé, pas sucré, ne fumez pas, ne buvez pas, ne conduisez pas trop vite, mangez vos cinq fruits et légumes par jour, faites du sport... et s'il vous reste du temps, pensez à vivre, tout simplement.

original: Of course, I knew it was dangerous.

original: What's your dad's name?

original: There are more outside than inside.

original: Leave your radio at home.

original: My wife does not share her worries with me.

original: We're alone.

original: He's already left.

original: She advised him to cut down on smoking, but he didn't think that he could.

original: Tom and Mary make a very nice couple.

original: He says he has always been true to his wife.

original: His old cat is still alive.

original: Thank you in advance.

original: She was painfully thin.

original: I love his daughter.

original: "Who did you suggest that to?" "Everybody." "And who agreed?" "Nobody."

original: The lights are on.

original: I was young and innocent.

original: Wrong!

original: That's her.

original: Have you brought your flask?

original: Oops, I did it again.

original: I start.

original: No face is perfectly symmetrical.

original: They can add a literal translation.
translated: Elles peuvent ajouter une traduction littérale.

original: The Joker is the wild card, OK?

original: There was some fallout.

original: I don't think I'm going to do that.

original: I wish we could settle this like adults.

original: Do you remember her name?

original: I don't believe you anymore.

original: The newer cars are at least ten thousand dollars more expensive than the earlier ones from the nineties.

original: Move your arse!

original: You do not want to incur the wrath of God.

original: I saw a cottage in the distance.

original: Please fill out the form below without leaving anything out.

original: They were whispering.

original: She told her that it would rain all day.

translated: Le singe descendit.

original: Have you already gone to the Oktoberfest in Munich?
translated: Êtes-vous déjà allé à la fête de la bière à Munich ?

original: Please play something by Chopin for me.
translated: Veuillez jouer un morceau de Chopin pour moi, je vous prie.

original: The next day was Christmas Day.
translated: Le jour suivant c'était Noël.

original: I should've gone to yesterday's meeting.
translated: J'aurais dû venir au rendez-vous d'hier.

original: Snow is falling on the mountains.
translated: La neige tombe sur les montagnes.

original: We rented the flat.
translated: Nous avons loué l'appartement.

original: They want a few more hours to finish the report.
translated: Elles souhaitent quelques heures supplémentaires pour finir le rapport.

original: I visited my father's grave.
translated: Je suis allé sur la tombe de mon père.

original: Game over.
translated: Fin de la partie.

original: I remember the first time.
translated: Je me souviens de la première fois.

original: I wonder if that's true.
translated: Je me demande si c'est vrai.

original: Happy International Women's Day!
translated: Bonne Journée internationale des femmes !

original: I hate it when you do that.
translated: Je déteste quand tu fais ça.

original: I'm nervous.
translated: Je suis nerveux.

original: Get me some water.
translated: Va me chercher de l'eau !

original: I am the happiest man on earth.
translated: Je suis l'homme le plus heureux de la terre.

original: Isn't that annoying?
translated: N'est-ce pas ennuyeux ?

original: A book is lying on the desk.
translated: Un livre est posé sur le bureau.

original: That dress is perfect for you.
translated: Cette robe est parfaite pour vous.

original: Beth was looking forward to meeting him, but he never showed up.
translated: Beth attendait avec impatience de le voir, mais il ne se montra jamais.

original: It is forbidden for you to touch that switch.
translated: Il t'est interdit de toucher cet interrupteur.

original: The cost of living increased dramatically.
translated: Le coût de la vie a augmenté de manière drastique.

original: I'm unhappy.
translated: Je suis mécontente.

original: The incident came in the wake of Al-Qaeda's admission of responsibility, in a statement published by the organization, for an attack that targeted the republican palace in the city of Al-Mukalla in southern Yemen and resulted in the deaths of 30 officers and soldiers.
translated: L'incident est survenu suite à l'admission par Al-Qaïda, dans une déclaration de l'organisation, de sa responsabilité dans une attaque qui a visé le palais républicain dans la ville d'Al-Mukalla au sud du Yémen et qui a provoqué la mort de 30 officiers et soldats.

original: You're a little liar.
translated: Tu es une petite menteuse.

original: Tom is extraordinary.
translated: Tom est exceptionnel.

original: They breed cattle and horses.
translated: Ils élèvent du bétail et des chevaux.

original: I wouldn't say it this way.
translated: Je ne le dirais pas ainsi.

original: I don't like spiders and snakes.
translated: Les araignées et les serpents ne me plaisent pas.

original: He knows his job.
translated: Il connaît son métier.

original: Do you not like girls?
translated: N'aimes-tu pas les filles ?

original: People don't say that anymore.
translated: On ne dit plus ça.

original: This is very difficult.
translated: C'est très difficile.

original: Please wait till noon.
translated: Attendez jusqu'à midi.

original: Tom declined the invitation.
translated: Tom a décliné l'invitation.

original: Don't hang up!
translated: Ne raccroche pas !

original: I'm glad you're all right.
translated: Je me réjouis que tu te portes bien.

original: I stayed at a cheap hotel.
translated: J'ai séjourné dans un hôtel bon marché.

original: Only God can help you now.
translated: Seul Dieu peut désormais vous aider.

original: The price of rice rose by more than three percent.
translated: Le prix du riz a augmenté de plus de trois pour cent.

original: We should raise our children as 'global citizens'.
translated: Nous devrions élever nos enfants comme des « citoyens du monde ».

original: Tom has a lot of pictures of Mary.
translated: Tom possède beaucoup de photos de Mary.

original: The system is rigged.
translated: Le système est truqué.

original: The failure depressed him.
translated: L'échec l'a déprimé.

original: I'm depressed.
translated: Je déprime.

original: You're creative.
translated: Vous êtes créative.

original: They refused to think of leaving.
translated: Ils refusèrent de songer à partir.

original: I hate my parents.
translated: Je déteste mes parents.

original: Kill me with words!
translated: Tue-moi par les mots !

original: He lashed out against the reporters.
translated: Il s'en est pris aux journalistes.

original: I have no money in my pocket.
translated: Je n'ai pas d'argent en poche.

original: I know about this already.
translated: Je le sais déjà.

original: She baptized me. She's my godmother.
translated: Elle m'a baptisé. C'est ma marraine.

original: Why don't I drive you?
translated: Pourquoi ne te conduirais-je pas ?

original: The telly's not working.
translated: Le téléviseur ne fonctionne pas.

original: A glass of mineral water is going to quench my thirst.
translated: Un verre d'eau minérale va me désaltérer.

original: She is kind.
translated: Elle est gentille.

original: I would like to know how to play the piano.
translated: J'aimerais savoir jouer du piano.
